trans-unit.source: Enter the name of this additional system language.
This option will hide the system language from being available in the backend.
trans-unit.target: Ta možnost skrije sistemski jezik tako, da ni na voljo v administracijskem vmesniku.

trans-unit.source: Defines which languages are alternatively available on each webpage.
trans-unit.target: Določa kateri jeziki so na voljo na posamezni spletni strani.

trans-unit.source: The Web>Page module has a feature which allows users to edit page content divided into not only columns but also languages. The languages available for translation are determined by the number of Website Language record created. For a webpage to be available in another language an "Alternative Page Language" record must be created on the page.
trans-unit.target: Modul Web>Stran omogoča uporabnikom, da lahko urejajo vsebino razdeljeno ne samo na stolpce, ampak tudi na jezike. Število jezikov, v katere lahko prevedemo stran, je določeno s številom zapisov "Jezik spletne strani". Če želite, da je stran na voljo v drugem jeziku, morate na njej ustvariti zapis "Alternativni jezik strani".
